report_title: Industry Research: Handbag, Luggage & Accessory Stores in the US
executive_summary: The industry includes specialty retail stores that primarily sell fashion accessories, such as handbags, costume jewelry, hats and small leather accessories. The industry also includes stores that primarily sell suitcases, backpacks and other kinds of luggage. Over the years to 2024, the industry has fared well, particularly as the number of trips, both foreign and domestic, taken by US residents exhibited strong growth in the first half of the period, driving demand for luggage items. Sharp declines in spending and travel amid the COVID-19 pandemic pressured key markets, but a surge in online shopping habits supported revenue despite the challenging conditions.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Swelling Demand From Men Has Supported Growth
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Over the past five years, there's been a dramatic rise in demand for men's accessories, which has positively impacted the growth of handbag, luggage and accessory stores.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Unique, High-Quality Accessory Lines for Men
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The industry has also seen growth in the men's luggage segment.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: External Competition Has Pressured the Industry
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: One of the key sources of this rising competition has been the accelerated growth of e-commerce platforms.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Stores Have Expanded Their Online Presence
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Booming e-commerce has brought a shift in the industry.
The last five years have witnessed a swing towards sustainability in the industry.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Personalized Handbags and Accessories Gained Popularity
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The trend of personalizing handbags has witnessed a sizeable climb in popularity.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Strong Economic Conditions Will Support Growth
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Over the next five years, improving economic conditions are predicted to provide a significant boost to the industry.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: A Changing Industry Landscape Has Threatened Traditional Store Operators
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Over the next five years, there will be a surge in the number of fashion rental companies and resale and refurbishment businesses.

industry_definition: This industry includes specialty retailers that primarily sell handbags, luggage, costume jewelry and clothing accessories.
key_trends: New market entrants, new product offerings and higher advertising expenditure have intensified competition in the industry.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Limited disposable income, leading to reduced spending.
Steady income and family responsibilities lead to target purchases.

products_and_services.product_description: Products include handbags and related accessories.

tier_1_suppliers: Leather Good & Luggage Manufacturing in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Consumer spending significantly impacts the industry
demand_determinants.determinant_description: Elevated consumer spending boosts industry revenue.

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Consumers Aged 25 to 44 Have a Propensity for Travel and are Interested in Fashion
demand_determinants.determinant_description: This age range is pivotal for style-sensitive purchases.
